title: How to Make Lemon Sugar

steps.headline: Grate the rind from the lemon.
steps.description: Be sure to thoroughly wash the lemon prior to removing the rind. Also, ensure that you are using as fine a grater as possible; the rind should be very fine and almost undetectable.

steps.headline: Mix the rind through the sugar.
Line a baking dish or similar with baking paper.
Sprinkle the sugar/lemon mixture over the baking dish evenly.
Leave to dry thoroughly.
steps.description: The rind must be dried out completely or it will spoil the sugar. As it dries, its oils infuse the sugar.

steps.headline: Pour the dried lemon sugar into an airtight storage container.
steps.description: It will keep like sugar. Use as required.
